title: New Icon/Avatar?
content: On a whim I updated my icon on Friday, but after some thought became convinced someone else had had a very similar icon a while back. Is this right, or am I imagining things?
author: Ehague

comments.content:
" or am I imagining things?"

No, I don't think you are.
You might be thinking of David Earls' avatar. It isn't bitmap houdstooth, but it is similar.

Btw that's a nice new icon you have there Miss Tiffany!

Suddenly there's a lot of new ones around, is it a bit of an annual ritual here?
I had to switch mine up to accommodate for the badge. I think a lot of people have. I drew this icon probably 5 years ago, thought I'd dust it off. Nice to hear it is still a good thing. :^) Thanks!
